message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8700?
I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8700. I'll make a new offer: I'll sell the product to you for $9200.
I appreciate your new offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8500?
I'm not willing to go back to $8500, Bob. I'll make a new offer: I'll sell the product to you for $9100.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not there. Would you be willing to meet me at $8000?
